name: Block Puzzle Classic Glow
description:
This is a classic yet innovative game! You use tetrominoes to fit the board has size(10x10). You tap and drag tetrominoes and drop to the board, when create to one or more lines and blocks in line will be eliminatead, more space is available in the play area and got scores.

[Freature]
- Easy and familiar to play
- All free
- Endless time
- No WIFI ? No problem!
- Glow design very nice
- Sound and effect
Download it and you will love this game!
